children.name: Aarav
children.bio: Quiet, kind, and loves science. Aarav spends hours reading medical books and dreams of helping others.

children.name: Meera
children.bio: Helps other kids in studies. Meera is patient, caring, and loves sharing knowledge with her friends.

children.name: Rohan
children.bio: Creative and curious, Rohan loves building things and solving problems. He's always tinkering with new ideas.

children.name: Priya
children.bio: Talented young artist who loves painting and drawing. Priya expresses her emotions through beautiful artwork.

children.name: Arjun
children.bio: Passionate about experiments and discovery. Arjun asks thoughtful questions and loves learning about the world.

children.name: Kavya
children.bio: Graceful and energetic, Kavya loves expressing herself through dance. She practices daily and dreams of performing on stage.

children.name: Vikram
children.bio: Fascinated by airplanes and the sky. Vikram reads about aviation and dreams of flying around the world one day.

children.name: Ananya
children.bio: Loves animals and cares deeply for them. Ananya wants to help sick and injured animals when she grows up.

children.name: Rahul
children.bio: Enjoys cooking and experimenting with flavors. Rahul loves helping in the kitchen and dreams of opening his own restaurant.

children.name: Sneha
children.bio: Imaginative storyteller who loves reading and writing. Sneha creates wonderful stories and poems that inspire others.

children.name: Aditya
children.bio: Talented with musical instruments and has a beautiful voice. Aditya brings joy to everyone with his music.

children.name: Isha
children.bio: Compassionate and caring, Isha wants to help people feel better. She's always looking out for others.

children.name: Karan
children.bio: Fair-minded and articulate, Karan wants to help people get justice. He's passionate about fairness and equality.

children.name: Divya
children.bio: Sees beauty in everything and loves capturing moments. Divya has a keen eye for detail and composition.

children.name: Manav
children.bio: Athletic and determined, Manav practices football daily. He dreams of playing professionally and representing his country.

children.name: Neha
children.bio: Caring and intelligent, Neha wants to save lives. She studies hard and is always ready to help others in need.

children.name: Rishi
children.bio: Fascinated by space and stars. Rishi reads about planets and dreams of exploring the universe one day.

children.name: Pooja
children.bio: Patient and kind, Pooja loves helping younger children learn. She's a natural teacher with endless patience.

children.name: Siddharth
children.dream: Wants to become a computer programmer
children.bio: Tech-savvy and creative, Siddharth loves coding and building apps. He dreams of creating software that helps people.

children.name: Aanya
children.dream: Wants to become a social worker
children.bio: Empathetic and dedicated, Aanya wants to help those in need. She's always thinking of ways to make the world better.

children.name: Yash
children.bio: Brave and helpful, Yash wants to save people from danger. He's courageous and always ready to help others.

children.name: Riya
children.bio: Beautiful voice and loves performing. Riya brings happiness to everyone with her songs and dreams of recording albums.

stories.title: From Fear to Confidence
stories.description: How SAHAAYA helped Riya gain confidence through education and support. Today, she's a confident young girl pursuing her dreams.

stories.title: A New Beginning
stories.description: Aarav came to SAHAAYA shy and withdrawn. Through our programs, he discovered his passion for science and is now thriving.

stories.title: The Power of Education
stories.description: Meera's journey from struggling with studies to becoming a top student and helping others shows the transformative power of education.
